definition: Gemini (constellation and sign of the zodiac)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: To you, Gemini's are irresponsible and unworthy of your dedication.
sentences.chinese: 雙子座人通常缺乏責任心，並不值得你付出一切。

sentences.english: Gemini grabs both turkey wings for themselves.
sentences.chinese: 雙子座獨霸了兩個雞翅。

sentences.english: This eclipse falls on a fixed star Alhena, and that indicates some difficulty in travel.
sentences.chinese: 月食落入雙子座意味着旅行中遭遇的困難。

sentences.english: Central Business District(CBD) of Beijing, view from LG Twin Tower(East).
sentences.chinese: 從雙子座大廈上拍攝北京中央商務區的一部分。

sentences.english: Aldrin had flown on the last of the Gemini flights.
sentences.chinese: 奧爾德林曾完成過“雙子座”的最後一次太空飛行。

sentences.english: Geminis are impossible to predict, so we shouldn't bother trying.
sentences.chinese: 雙子座的人無法預料，所以我們也無須費心去嘗試了。

sentences.english: Happily, Schirra sent a radio message to Gemini Seven.
sentences.chinese: 令人高興的是，斯基拉發出無線電訊息雙子座七個。

sentences.english: The Gemini man is a real charmer and has a good sense of humor.
sentences.chinese: 雙子座人是真正的魔術師且非常幽默。

sentences.english: Read more on compatibility for Gemini and Sagittarius.
sentences.chinese: 更多詳情請參見文章《和雙子座相配的星座》。

sentences.english: Aquarius is an air sign, like Gemini and Libra.
sentences.chinese: 水瓶座和雙子座，天秤座一樣都是風象形作。

sentences.english: The twins are fond of ginger and parsley.
sentences.chinese: 雙子座比較喜歡姜和西芹口味。

sentences.english: What can the zodiac reveal about the Gemini love-habits?
sentences.chinese: 更重要的是，黃道帶對雙子座的愛情觀有何影響？

sentences.english: Ready for change, fast and furious？ Gemini's love variety and are the most curious Signs of the Zodiac.
sentences.chinese: 因爲雙子座人是在整個黃道帶裏最富好奇心的星座。

sentences.english: The element air makes the Gemini man a quick and effective communicator.
sentences.chinese: 空氣元素使得雙子座人成爲高效迅速的交流者。

sentences.english: If a Gemini were to be a superhero, he would have the power of persuasion.
sentences.chinese: 如果雙子座是個超級英雄，他的說服力一定很強。

definition: Leo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 室女座[Shi4 nu:3 zuo4]
Pisces (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Scorpio or Scorpius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Leo (star sign)/Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
now hot, now cold/(of one's mood, affection etc) to alternate
